Name: Eraser
About the game: Eraser is a survival game in a world of endless hardcore, where you improve with each unique battle. Your goal is simple - survive, but it won't be that easy. Hoards of hungry and bloodthirsty mutants are waiting for the moment to tear you apart. Would you last for long enough? Level up Destroy the enemies by leveling up to improve your character and get stronger. Earn money, gain skills and unlock heroes Carnage lots of enemies to get more money which can be used to buy new weapons, improve your skills and unlock unique characters. Variety Play on different maps encountering unique enemies and bosses. Sortie Each run can be completed in 30 minutes In each sortie you pump up skills that enhance your character in the current sortie. You can combine different skills to get unique bundles for different situations. At the moment, Eraser contains: 4 Maps with their own characteristics 4 Characters with unique characteristics Lots of weapons Different skills to improve the hero Variety of enemies Dynamic gameplay
